data.quote: I didn't want people to think I'm just in the movies, where you make money and wait around for 13 hours before you get to do 20 minutes of work.
data.author: D. B. Sweeney

data.quote: The only thing I find difficult to watch - horror movies - not that I don't like them. Like 'The Shining,' it's one of my favorite movies, but it's terrifying. I feel like I've watched a marathon afterwards.
data.author: Nikolaj Coster-Waldau

data.quote: I absolutely love genre movies. When I was a kid, I was really impacted by genre films and cult classics.
data.author: Lucas Till

data.quote: The secret to film is that it's an illusion.
data.author: George Lucas

data.quote: I've never been that much of a money guy. I'm more of a film guy, and most of the money I've made is in defense of trying to keep creative control of my movies.
data.author: George Lucas

data.quote: Changes are not unusual - I mean, most movies, when they release them, they make changes. But somehow, when I make the slightest change, everybody thinks it's the end of the world.
data.author: George Lucas

data.quote: The movies I like watching the most are these sort of cinema verite, handheld films where you really get gritty with people. But I also have this strange affinity for old Rock Hudson/Doris Day movies and things that sort of pop out where you see the frames, where you have these 2D animation moments and split-screens and things like that.
data.author: James Gunn

data.quote: I would do anything for a part, nearly anything. Being in movies doesn't mean being pretty.
data.author: Diane Kruger

data.quote: Well, Toronto, I consider to be the birthplace of my films. I've made three films and this is the third one to premiere here in the same theater on the same day at the same time - they are my audience. They're the people that I think about while I'm writing, directing, and editing. I specifically make movies for them.
data.author: Jason Reitman

data.quote: It can have an enormous effect because big budget movies can have big budget perks, and small budget movies have no perks, but what is the driving force, of course, is the script, and your part in it.
data.author: Morgan Freeman

data.quote: I think with movies I am really connecting to the Joseph Campbell idea of the collective unconscious.
data.author: Will Smith

data.quote: In today's world, America's soft power is commonly thought to reside in the global popularity of Hollywood movies, Coca-Cola, McDonald's and Starbucks.
data.author: Ahmed Zewail

data.quote: I feel sorry for people who only know comic books through movies. I really do.
data.author: Ta-Nehisi Coates

data.quote: I'm not an admirer of action movies. I just think, Oh my God, it must be so tiring.
data.author: Catherine Deneuve

data.quote: Live theater to me is much more free than the movies or television.
data.author: Eartha Kitt

data.quote: I'll tell you what I really enjoy. We all go to the movies, we all watch television, we know what they're about, how they work. When the main character is a cop or a spy, it's very exciting, but I also very much enjoy when the main characters are nobodies - a trucker.
data.author: Nathan Fillion

data.quote: I remember my first taste of American big movies was 'Ghost Rider.' I'm in two little scenes. But for those two little scenes they had 400 extras, upside-down stunt cars, and a fire brigade.
data.author: Rebel Wilson

data.quote: My entertainment was going to the local dollar movie theatre on the weekend, where I watched old black and white movies. If you wanted current movies, you had to drive to the big city.
data.author: L'Wren Scott

data.quote: All that running around in my underwear put money in my pockets. I can focus on working in interesting movies without having to worry about supporting myself.
data.author: Mark Wahlberg

data.quote: 'The Lunchbox' is the kind of cinema that is true to its word and not cluttered or corrupted by some of the mainstream pre-requisites. I love the way I make movies, but there are certain stories that need to be told in a certain way, and 'The Lunchbox' is that movie, and I'm so proud to present this movie.
data.author: Karan Johar

data.quote: Whether or not we communicate it, I definitely seek my mom's acceptance and approval for everything. She has a strong commercial sense of movies and is a quintessential audience. When she doesn't like something, I know there is reason to worry. When she loves something, there is reason to celebrate.
data.author: Karan Johar

data.quote: I met Hugh Jackman, and I was like, 'I love your movies!' And, of course, he asked, 'Which one?' A reasonable question, but I blanked completely. In that moment, I couldn't remember a single film that Hugh Jackman had done. So I copped out. 'The recent one!' And that was one of his biggest disasters. Well done, me.
data.author: Karan Johar

data.quote: Making movies is controlled anarchy, chaos.
data.author: Michael Cimino

data.quote: One of the nice things about books as opposed to television and movies to some extent is it's not a passive entertainment. People really do get involved, and they do create, and they do have their own visions of what different characters look like and what should happen. It's great - it means their brains are working.
data.author: James Patterson

data.quote: Commercial books don't even get covered. The reason why so many book reviews go out of business is because they cover a lot of stuff that nobody cares about. Imagine if the movie pages covered none of the big movies and all they covered were movies that you couldn't even find in the theater?
data.author: James Patterson

data.quote: I think it would be very boring dramatically to have a film where everybody was a lawyer or doctor and had no faults. To me, the most important thing is to be truthful.
data.author: Spike Lee

data.quote: A lot of times you get credit for stuff in your movies you didn't intend to be there.
data.author: Spike Lee

data.quote: Movies are not scripts - movies are films; they're not books, they're not the theatre.
data.author: Nicolas Roeg

data.quote: Mirrors are the essence of movies.
data.author: Nicolas Roeg

data.quote: Our memory and the movies keep movie stars alive for us, and Tony Curtis is still a star.
data.author: Nicolas Roeg

data.quote: Women's roles in the movies remain, for the most part, girlfriends, mothers, wives.
data.author: Rebecca Traister

data.quote: I've played a lot of mothers in my movies.
data.author: Vera Farmiga

data.quote: I like all of the mental, psychological thriller movies too. I enjoy horror movies across the board.
data.author: Sophia Bush

data.quote: I've been in so many good movies that I felt like nobody saw it's a pretty dreadful feeling.
data.author: Woody Harrelson

data.quote: People wrestle sometimes making movies, and I think that conflict is a very essential thing. I think a lot of very happy productions have produced a lot of very banal movies.
data.author: Edward Norton

data.quote: We've all seen 'Network' and 'Wag the Dog,' but we were somehow insulated by the fact that those were just movies, fictions, and we could rest easy that the Real News doesn't operate that way. Well, it does - sometimes.
data.author: Peter Landesman

data.quote: People go to the movies to have an emotional experience, not to learn information they could look up on Wikipedia.
data.author: Peter Landesman

data.quote: Whether it's the experiments on 'MythBusters' or my earlier work in special effects for movies, I've regularly had to do things that were never done before, from designing complex motion-control rigs to figuring out how to animate chocolate.
data.author: Adam Savage

data.quote: Why not premiere movies on Netflix the same day they're opening in theaters? Listen to the consumer give the consumer what they want.
data.author: Ted Sarandos

data.quote: There's nothing more important in making movies than the screenplay.
data.author: Richard Attenborough

data.quote: The only reason anyone goes to Broadway is because they can't get work in the movies.
data.author: Bette Davis

data.quote: Hollywood has the idea that movies have to be dumb. But especially movies for or about teenagers have to be really dumb!
data.author: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

data.quote: After 'Prom Night' I did two movies where I was playing a prostitute. I gravitate towards characters that have some sort of inner turmoil or some sort of character arc. That's the great thing about acting, so many different things and being really diverse in your choices.
data.author: Brittany Snow

data.quote: My dad sat me in front of the TV, and instead of putting on Nick Jr. or something, he put me in front of 'Jailhouse Rock' and all the Elvis movies.
data.author: Drake Bell

data.quote: I like mainstream movies that are completely off the wall.
data.author: Robert Downey, Jr.

data.quote: I spent my entire youth in front of a TV watching old movies, and as soon as I was able to get a subway pass, when I was 14, I joined the Museum of Modern Art and was there all weekend watching old movies.
data.author: Amy Heckerling

data.quote: When I make a film I'm away from home for two to three months. So I want my kids to look at my films one day and say, I love his movies, I love his choices-because he loved them.
data.author: Kevin Costner

data.quote: I've had some movies that have been ridiculed, but that's OK with me. I don't feel that really defines me. Should I change who I am to be popular?
data.author: Kevin Costner

data.quote: I want to make movies that pierce people's hearts and touch them in some way, even if it's just for the night while they're in the cinema; in that moment, I want to bring actual tears to their eyes and goosebumps to their skin.
data.author: Russell Crowe

data.quote: I lost my front tooth in rugby league when a fat guy from Bellevue Hill kicked me in the face as I got up from a tackle to mark him. I made this decision not to cap the tooth because I thought it was false. But I didn't make any movies as a teenager, and I had a very hard time with girls and stuff.
data.author: Russell Crowe

data.quote: It's the contemporary woman that movies don't know what to do with, other than bathe her in a bridal glow in romantic comedies where both the romance and the comedy are artificial sweeteners.
data.author: James Wolcott

data.quote: Right after 'The Wackness' came out, it was a really exciting time, and then it was a bit disappointing when it came out. Even though not that many people saw it, I was still getting offered some movies. I was thinking that people would just stop calling me since it didn't do very well at the box office.
data.author: Jonathan Levine

data.quote: Go see it and see for yourself why you shouldn't go see it.
data.author: Samuel Goldwyn

data.quote: Why should people go out and pay money to see bad films when they can stay at home and see bad television for nothing?
data.author: Samuel Goldwyn

data.quote: I get inspiration from literally everything and anything. I take inspiration from people, relationships, stories, and I take inspiration from movies I see, books I read and songs I hear.
data.author: Sabrina Carpenter

data.quote: What really matters is your movies and how good a person you are. Otherwise, tabloids and news channels writing about you only builds your curiosity and stardom and propels you to reach wider places.
data.author: Ranbir Kapoor

data.quote: Comedy. It was just huge in my house. Peter Sellers and Alec Guinness, Monty Python and all those James Bond movies were highly regarded.
data.author: Mike Myers

data.quote: I hate when the sun is high and there are no shadows. If I could do super high-budget movies, I would only shoot when the sun starts to get low - but you can't just shoot for four hours every day.
data.author: Susanne Bier

data.quote: I've always been slightly hesitant about generalizing movies made by men and women being different in their nature; I think movies by each director are different. Having said that, I think that it's kind of disgraceful that there aren't more female directors.
data.author: Susanne Bier

data.quote: I've been lucky, I've had movies that made a lot of money, so I don't feel like I have to kill every time out. I don't want that pressure. I don't need it.
data.author: Bill Murray

data.quote: I've never made any horrible, horrible movies. If you don't ruin your reputation, you can always get work.
data.author: Bill Murray

data.quote: I've been into horror movies ever since I was five years old.
data.author: Kirk Hammett

data.quote: The same sensations that you get in heavy metal are in horror movies. Heavy metal sounds evil and horror movies are evil, ha ha!
data.author: Kirk Hammett

data.quote: I really don't have any solutions and I don't like movies that do.
data.author: Charlie Kaufman

data.quote: Trying to constantly get yourself into movies is extremely stressful and sometimes just impossible.
data.author: Seth Rogen

data.quote: Growing up I didn't watch movies.
data.author: Denzel Washington

data.quote: Being alone is scarier than any boogey man and the reason why I don't choose to see Horror movies as a rule.
data.author: Tom Sizemore

data.quote: If you don't like my movies, don't watch them.
data.author: Dario Argento

data.quote: True violence, not the kind you usually see in television or movies, touches something very deep and primal in people.
data.author: Mark Frost

data.quote: In India, there is a psychological problem that movies going to film festivals are boring. It is a problem with exhibitors.
data.author: Anurag Kashyap

data.quote: My agent said, 'You aren't good enough for movies.' I said, 'You're fired.'
data.author: Sally Field

data.quote: If you can market smut and toilet paper, you can market movies.
data.author: Dawn Steel

data.quote: I would love to have more kids. Kids are the best part of my day. I don't wake up to make movies. I wake up to hang out with my family.
data.author: Reese Witherspoon

data.quote: I love movies.
data.author: Greg Boyle

data.quote: I did 14 movies in six years, I had a cartoon TV show, and I don't want to do that again. I just want to make unique pieces of art. That's why I quit everything when I was 14 and sat around for eight years before I did another movie.
data.author: Macaulay Culkin

data.quote: I try to watch a movie a day, if not more, and through movies, I learned about so many different political themes I hadn't been interested in and cultural things I hadn't been aware of and economic factors I hadn't thought about.
data.author: Hideo Kojima

data.quote: 'Little Miss Sunshine' snowballed. It was a tiny movie. We shot it in 30 days, and it was really fun to do, but it was one of those small movies that you don't hold out huge hope for.
data.author: Greg Kinnear

data.quote: I guess you just feel like there's a whole story that's not being told in movies. You're only seeing the macho guy version of a story that from the woman's side, may be completely different.
data.author: Heather Graham

data.quote: So I know how I watch movies which is on my laptop, man. And that's how I suspect a lot of people do it.
data.author: Kevin Smith

data.quote: Hitchcock had a charm about him. He was very funny at times. He was incredibly brilliant in his field of suspense.
data.author: Tippi Hedren

data.quote: When I started to watch some of the films I'd done, I realized I was doing movies that I might not actually want to see.
data.author: Heath Ledger

data.quote: Movie magic is movie magic and acting magic is acting magic.
data.author: Ben Kingsley

data.quote: I always wanted to be a stay-at-home dad making art, making movies.
data.author: Robert Rodriguez

data.quote: I do like strong women in my movies. I have five sisters, so I've just grown up with that model.
data.author: Robert Rodriguez

data.quote: We ogle plants and animals up close on television, the Internet and in the movies. We may not worship the animals we see, but we still regard them as necessary physical and spiritual companions. Technological nature can't completely satisfy that yearning.
data.author: Diane Ackerman

data.quote: Besides the fact that I make movies, there's nothing interesting about my life at all, unfortunately.
data.author: Jonah Hill

data.quote: I just like to act and write and produce. To me, making movies is the ultimate goal.
data.author: Jonah Hill

data.quote: All the movies that I have done I have not been in control of. Sometimes there is a contractual situation where you go to the studio, and they kind of tell you which ones they want you to do.
data.author: Steven Seagal

data.quote: I love swimming, tennis, and I am taking up golf. I am not serious about it, I just go to the range and practice. Other than that, I enjoy going to the movies and hanging out with my friends.
data.author: Mila Kunis

data.quote: When I was a little girl, I watched all old movies. My mother liked old movies, and she loved shopping for antiques, so I was around old things all the time.
data.author: Dita Von Teese

data.quote: I just think old old movies, they make you concentrate and pay attention so much more. They feel so warm. A lot of modern digital videotape, it's just too bright. Don't know why, it's not warm.
data.author: Jack White

data.quote: I missed out on everything. Sometimes on the street I see teenagers hanging out and going to the movies, going to concerts, and I get so jealous.
data.author: Adriana Lima

data.quote: I never cared about making one coherent masterpiece with a conventional narrative. I always wanted my movies to have images falling from all directions in a vaudevillian way. If you didn't like what was happening in one scene, you could just snooze through it until the next scene.
data.author: Harmony Korine

data.quote: I'm so sick of seeing these movies where married couples are just cuddling on the couch and caressing each other's faces.
data.author: Leslie Mann

data.quote: My biggest challenge is to not do urban movies for the rest of my life, those alpha hoodies.
data.author: John Boyega

data.quote: I have kind of a funny relationship with movies. I don't have to see the whole movie to get an impression of it or to let it have an influence on me.
data.author: Lana Del Rey

data.quote: I've had broken bones and cuts and dashes and tears from movies, but when I was five, my mom put the biscuits up high so we wouldn't be helping ourselves. So, one day I asked to stand up on a chair to get a biscuit, and it fell, and the corner of the chair went right into the side of my eye, and it made a big hole in there.
data.author: Gerard Butler

data.quote: You can make a thousand different movies about the same subject.
data.author: Pedro Almodovar

data.quote: Everybody gets typecast in movies, but you have to make wise choices. I'd say around 90 percent of movie casting is about the way you look, so you have to fight that. If producers had their way, I'd only be in action films, but I'm interested in a more varied career than that.
data.author: Famke Janssen

data.quote: Ultimately, if you look at all my films from 'Bloody Sunday' on, they're steeped in a post-9/11 atmosphere. 'United 93' is directly about 9/11, of course, but every one of the movies deals with paranoia, mistrust, and fear.
data.author: Paul Greengrass

data.quote: It's a juggernaut, yeah... but I'm not phased by making movies.
data.author: Matthew Vaughn

data.quote: When I was a little boy I used to borrow my father's hat, and make a press card to stick in the hat band. That was the way reporters were always portrayed in the movies.
data.author: Charles Kuralt

data.quote: You won't find me in a romantic comedy. Those movies don't speak to me. People don't come to talk to me about those scripts, because they probably think I'm this dark, twisted, miserable person.
data.author: Naomi Watts

data.quote: If I have to produce movies, direct movies, whatever to change the way Hollywood treats older women, I'll do it. If I have to bend the rules, I will. If I have to break them, I will.
data.author: Naomi Watts

data.quote: I don't know that movies are important. But I know that stories are important. Movies may disappear. They've only been around, for God's sake, for the last hundred years... I think that it's the need to tell stories, and that people need to be told stories. It's the old sitting around the fire, you know.
data.author: Allison Anders

data.quote: You still get the movies made. A filmmaker can always scrape up money to do a movie. The passion drives it. And you'll get the money. Money's the easiest thing. But the hardest thing is finding a way for people to see your movie.
data.author: Allison Anders

data.quote: I don't like to watch my own movies - I fall asleep in my own movies.
data.author: Robert De Niro

data.quote: I quit doing the movies because the wrestling was going so good and was so on fire during the '80s and '90s, but I was getting all these movie scripts.
data.author: Hulk Hogan

data.quote: Movies have these transcendent moments where everything is just right, from the dialogue to the music to the lighting to the narrative context; everything is just perfect, and something magical happens - the film breaks through the screen and does something to you.
data.author: Jason Silva

data.quote: Books and movies are different art forms with different rules. And because of that, they never translate exactly.
data.author: Tom Clancy

data.quote: I don't see my movies. I think it's healthier and safer to keep a bit of distance. I'm afraid to be disappointed.
data.author: Bernardo Bertolucci

data.quote: I don't see my movies. When you ask me about one of my movies, it just goes in my memory because maybe sometimes I confuse one for another. I think all movies are like sequences, which is the body of my work.
data.author: Bernardo Bertolucci

data.quote: My passion is capturing what it feels like to love, be it romantic or otherwise. I love to watch two people realize what they meant for each other - and that goes across all media, books, TV, movies, personal essays; everything.
data.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid

data.quote: They allow us to disrespect our Black woman. A lot of these things would be considered criminal if it were to be carried out in the streets. That's like when they tell you after you buy your VHS and you rent movies they tell you not to copy the movies.
data.author: Afrika Bambaataa

data.quote: Making movies is just like betting on horses at the racetrack.
data.author: Maureen O'Hara

data.quote: There is the moral spectrum in 'Fargo,' and you see it in other Coen brothers movies, where you have a very good character on one end and a very bad character on the other.
data.author: Noah Hawley

data.quote: A producer is always behind the scenes, even more in the movies - nobody sees you. I didn't even meet most of the actors. When I worked on 'Top Gun,' I never met Tom Cruise. You were always in the background.
data.author: Giorgio Moroder

data.quote: It's all about escapism. That's essentially what all movies are about. It's a vicarious thrill.
data.author: Todd Phillips

data.quote: I love making movies, and being in any that I can be in. I'd like to be in those giant movies, as the fifth or sixth lead, and have three or four killer scenes. You don't have the responsibility of the entire movie being on you. I like those roles. I'm shooting for the middle.
data.author: Bill Burr

data.quote: Family entertainment is really very necessary in our culture. Look how profitable they are. It's almost not discretionary. You need to take your family to the movies.
data.author: Gary Ross

data.quote: As a kid growing up in a small town in Washington State, my only exposure to New York City was through movies. The town with its towering skyscrapers, fascinating people and teeming energy absolutely captivated me.
data.author: Robert Osborne

data.quote: I love dancing just because I've done it my whole life and it's definitely what I want to do. I feel like, I want to train with acting and do movies. Those two are my main priorities. I definitely want to be able to sing and model, too. I definitely love those, too.
data.author: Maddie Ziegler

data.quote: I think movies are a director's medium in the end. Theater is the actor's medium. Theater is fast, and enjoyable, and truly rewarding. I believe in great live performance.
data.author: Sam Mendes

data.quote: The movies that influenced me were movies that told their stories through pictures more than words.
data.author: Sam Mendes

data.quote: I love horror movies because they're really fun. They tap into those wonderful primal emotions.
data.author: Margot Kidder

data.quote: It's seldom that you find great moments in television. Usually you remember - in 'Breaking Bad' or any of these other great shows - you remember situations or characters. Not moments. But I have to say, I can make the same argument for mainstream movies, which have bad narratives and also no memorable moments.
data.author: Alfonso Cuaron

data.quote: I get ideas from everywhere: movies, books, movies, nature - it comes into my brain, it sits there for a while, and it starts coming back out.
data.author: Tony DiTerlizzi

data.quote: I look at myself as an audience member. I still love movies, and I still go and sit in the back of the big dark room with everybody else, and I want the same thrill.
data.author: Samuel L. Jackson

data.quote: I think 'North by Northwest' and 'Rope' and Rear Window' and 'Psycho' are on my list of favorite all time movies. I just think his kind of command as a director was almost unparalleled, and I feel like in certain ways the sort of character-based thriller owes more to Hitchcock than anyone.
data.author: Carlton Cuse

data.quote: Movies portray men as tough guys.
data.author: Geoffrey Canada

data.quote: We spend all this energy keeping our lives normal and safe and predictable, and the result is that our approved cultural safety valve is the movies. So in films, anyway, the hero is obliged to represent the continuance of social values and institutions, and his permission to act is much more seriously limited than the villain's.
data.author: Peter Coyote

data.quote: Even if I set out to make a film about a fillet of sole, it would be about me.
data.author: Federico Fellini

data.quote: The dubbing of the music and effects is really incredible today. You're feeling gun shots. I mean, it's not the way people say it is, but the gunshot sounds real. And cars sound real. Among the many things in the evolution (of movies) is to make the sound in the movie incredible. That's what you feel.
data.author: Joel Silver

data.quote: I can't really remember my life without movies.
data.author: Elle Fanning

data.quote: Life is short. I'm 47 years old. I've got 10 years to go where I can be the best I can be. I want those 10 years to be precious, not like before, cranking two or three movies a year. I've made a ton of movies in my life, but so what?
data.author: Jean-Claude Van Damme

data.quote: My body looks like 30 but my face looks like 50. But I cannot walk bare-chested in the streets. I like to do these movies to challenge myself physically.
data.author: Jean-Claude Van Damme

data.quote: I was studying to be an architect, I wasn't plotting to join the movies. Films were just another career option. I took acting up with the same schoolgirl enthusiasm I had for examinations. Acting is a job and I take it very seriously.
data.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

data.quote: I love to hang out with my friends and go to the movies. My mom and I are involved in the Mother/Daughter Organization - national charity work. Whenever I get free time, we volunteer. It's an organization so mothers and daughters can spend time together while volunteering.
data.author: Hailee Steinfeld

data.quote: I've made 122 movies, and I daresay there's a picture of mine showing somewhere in the world every day.
data.author: Tony Curtis

data.quote: I'm a spoilt brat. I thought I was just going to walk in and make movies. But I'd been my own boss for so long that all of a sudden to be facing a roomful of people who were niggling over every little scene... I just thought I'd go back and draw my comics and have a happy life.
data.author: Frank Miller

data.quote: I was dirt-poor. I could barely hold down a job. Eventually, though, I started getting small parts on shows like 'Smallville,' 'Supernatural'... and lots of really bad sci-fi movies. I was running around the woods in wolf contacts, covered in fake blood made out of pancake syrup, roaring.
data.author: Cory Monteith

data.quote: I have a checklist of things I'd like to do in movies. One of them is get possessed. Die on a deathbed with a ghostly pallor - that's on my list.
data.author: Talulah Riley

data.quote: For a number of years, I'd been around the kind of people who financed movies and the kind of people who are there to make the deals for movies. But I'd always had this naive idea that everybody wants to make movies as good as they can be, which is stupid.
data.author: David Fincher

data.quote: When you make the kind of movies I make, you get weird letters from people.
data.author: David Fincher

data.quote: I think you really have to remember what you loved about making music in the first place. Ultimately, people can be like, 'We've seen this dude in many movies,' but if they hear a song and they're feeling it, they can look past all the personal things and not hold it against you that you're also an actor.
data.author: Common

data.quote: I never enjoyed working in a film.
data.author: Marlene Dietrich

data.quote: I always loved silent movies. I was not a specialist, but I loved them. And when I started directing, I became really fascinated by the format - how it works, the device of the silent movie. It's not the same form of expression as a talkie. The lack of sounds makes you participate in the storytelling.
data.author: Michel Hazanavicius

data.quote: I'm not a huge fan of scary movies, but I love doing them because your character arc gets condensed, and everything is elevated, and so you kind of have this amazing opportunity to go in many different places.
data.author: Imogen Poots

data.quote: I used to love Kapil Dev and, like any schoolboy, wanted to become a cricketer till I started dreaming of making movies.
data.author: Imtiaz Ali

data.quote: I love going to the movies and getting Raisinets, a big tub of popcorn and a Coke. That's definitely a guilty pleasure because I can't be doing that all the time.
data.author: Sanaa Lathan

data.quote: I think it's probably the Dutch who are to blame for starting the whole 'art business', because before they came along, art was attached to relatively stable structures, and it was everybody's. It was like going to the movies.
data.author: Antony Gormley

data.quote: The two Hindi movies that I did were not marketed well, and so not many people came to watch the film, hence the audience doesn't know much about me. I am a newcomer, and I cannot sell a film on my own. There has to be a backing in terms of producers.
data.author: Tena Desae

data.quote: I do not fear anybody on the field or in society, but I fear at night when I am away from my parents. I am scared of the unknown described in horror movies.
data.author: Saina Nehwal

data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: In the affairs of this world, men are saved not by faith, but by the want of it.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: Our faith comes in moments our vice is habitual.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: The faith that stands on authority is not faith.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: I believe in my Mormon faith, and I endeavor to live by it. My faith is the faith of my fathers - I will be true to them and to my beliefs.
data.author: Mitt Romney

data.quote: When doubt comes against us, we have to lift up the shield of faith. We do this when we open our mouth and say what God's Word says, rather than grumbling and complaining about the problem.
data.author: Joyce Meyer

data.quote: I've learned through my own relationship with God that He's not expecting me to be perfect; He wants me to do my best to be in His will and take steps of faith as He leads me, through His Word and the promptings He speaks to my heart.
data.author: Joyce Meyer

data.quote: The left puts a lot of faith in a lot of people in the past that were dismal failures that they think are the greatest people who ever lived.
data.author: Rush Limbaugh

data.quote: To insure the adoration of a theorem for any length of time, faith is not enough, a police force is needed as well.
data.author: Albert Camus

data.quote: We see ourselves in terms of yesterday and today. Our Heavenly Father sees us in terms of forever.
data.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

data.quote: Don't be discouraged if the answer to your prayer does not come immediately. Study, ponder, and pray, sincerely having faith, and live the commandments.
data.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

data.quote: Some people are weak in their faith and testimonies but are not even aware of how precarious their situation is. Many of them likely would be offended at the suggestion.
data.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

data.quote: Faith is easy I think people complicate it.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: I can't prove it scientifically, that there's a God, but I believe.
data.author: Billy Graham

data.quote: Each party steals so many articles of faith from the other, and the candidates spend so much time making each other's speeches, that by the time election day is past there is nothing much to do save turn the sitting rascals out and let a new gang in.
data.author: H. L. Mencken

data.quote: A faith is a necessity to a man. Woe to him who believes in nothing.
data.author: Victor Hugo

data.quote: Ultimately, blind faith is the only kind.
data.author: Mason Cooley

data.quote: Bad faith likes discourse on friendship and loyalty.
data.author: Mason Cooley

data.quote: I believe in spirits. I believe in faith. I believe in spirituality. I believe in aliens as well.
data.author: James Wan

data.quote: I'm a person that's grounded in faith and believe that my core values, motivation, inspiration, draw from a conception of the world in that way.
data.author: Cory Booker

data.quote: In the Church, and in the journey of faith, women have had and still have a special role in opening doors to the Lord.
data.author: Pope Francis

data.quote: Sin, also for those who don't have faith, exists when one goes against one's conscience. To listen to and obey it means, in fact, to decide in face of what is perceived as good or evil. And on this decision pivots the goodness or malice of our action.
data.author: Pope Francis

data.quote: Duty cannot exist without faith.
data.author: Benjamin Disraeli

data.quote: Call-time has renewed my faith in the need for public financing of elections. 'Call-time' is where I as the candidate, sit in a room with my 'call-time manager,' and a phone. Then I call people and ask them for money. For hours. Apparently, I'm really good at it.
data.author: Al Franken
